original_solution_mapping.L1: Ned has gone up 165 / 11 = <<165/11=15>>15 flights of stairs.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Thus, he has 20 - 15 = <<20-15=5>>5 flights of stairs left to run up.
original_solution_mapping.L3: He will spend 5 * 11 = <<5*11=55>>55 seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Therefore, he will have 72 - 55 = <<72-55=17>>17 seconds to defuse the bomb.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1463.
    Returns: the number of seconds Ned will have to diffuse the bomb.
    """
    # L1
    seconds_spent_running = 165 # Ned has spent 165 seconds running up the stairs
    time_per_flight = 11 # Ned can run up one flight of stairs in eleven seconds
    flights_climbed = seconds_spent_running / time_per_flight

    # L2
    total_flights = 20 # The building has twenty flights of stairs to the top floor
    remaining_flights = total_flights - flights_climbed

    # L3
    time_for_remaining_flights = remaining_flights * time_per_flight

    # L4
    initial_bomb_timer = 72 # The time bomb has 72 seconds left on the timer
    time_to_diffuse = initial_bomb_timer - time_for_remaining_flights

    # FA
    answer = time_to_diffuse
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Ned has gone up {seconds_spent_running} / {time_per_flight} = <<{seconds_spent_running}/{time_per_flight}={flights_climbed}>>{flights_climbed} flights of stairs.
Thus, he has {total_flights} - {flights_climbed} = <<{total_flights}-{flights_climbed}={remaining_flights}>>{remaining_flights} flights of stairs left to run up.

He will spend {remaining_flights} * {time_per_flight} = <<{remaining_flights}*{time_per_flight}={time_for_remaining_flights}>>{time_for_remaining_flights} seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
Therefore, he will have {initial_bomb_timer} - {time_for_remaining_flights} = <<{initial_bomb_timer}-{time_for_remaining_flights}={time_to_diffuse}>>{time_to_diffuse} seconds to defuse the bomb.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Ned has gone up 165 / 11 = <<165/11=15>>15 flights of stairs.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Thus, he has 20 - 15 = <<20-15=5>>5 flights of stairs left to run up.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He will spend 5 * 11 = <<5*11=55>>55 seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Therefore, he will have 72 - 20 = <<72-20=52>>52 seconds to defuse the bomb.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_flights' (value: 20) was used instead of 'time_for_remaining_flights' (value: 55.0).
